name: TwinBots
description:
TWINBOTS

Made for the Weekly Game Jam #36: Theme: 'Twins'

Created with Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Developer

How to Play:

Control both the Red bot (Roshi) and Blue bot (Moshi) at the same time. When they touch the floor, it get's painted their color. 

Each square space is 10 points.

 When Blue covers Red, or Red covers Blue, the square turns purple, granting you 10 more points for each purple square. 

Cover the whole floor with paint to advance to the next zone.

Beware of the floating fiends that will kill the bots when they hit you.

Only made six zones due to time constraints. Just found this Jam two days ago :|

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Leave feedback if you want. <3 :]
